file.name: openapi-with-properties.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Book API
  description: Creates books
  contact:
    name: '@agoncal'
    url: https://twitter.com/agoncal
  version: "1.0"
tags:
- name: Book REST Endpoint
paths:
  /api/books:
    post:
      tags:
      - Book REST Endpoint
      summary: Creates a new book
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                title:
                  type: string
                author:
                  type: string
                year:
                  format: int32
                  type: integer
                genre:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Book'
components:
  schemas:
    Book:
      description: A book
      required:
      - isbn_13
      - title
      type: object
      properties:
        author:
          type: string
        creation_date:
          format: date
          type: string
        genre:
          type: string
        isbn_13:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        year_of_publication:
          format: int32
          type: integer
